response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it's worth every penny of its $12,000 price tag. Considering its immense worth to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10,500. This is an opportunity to secure a remarkable asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 10500}
